block.p: KANEB PIPELINE PARTNERS LP., -- Richardson, Tex., said it bought a storage terminal near Philadelphia from GATX Corp., Chicago, for an undisclosed price to expand in the eastern U.S.
ALZA CORP., -- Mountain View, Calif., said it would split its stock, giving shareholders two shares for each they own as of Nov. 1, payable Nov. 15.
KANEB PIPELINE PARTNERS LP., -- Richardson, Tex., said it bought a storage terminal near Philadelphia from GATX Corp., Chicago, for an undisclosed price to expand in the eastern U.S.
ALZA CORP., -- Mountain View, Calif., said it would split its stock, giving shareholders two shares for each they own as of Nov. 1, payable Nov. 15.
TRANS WORLD ENTERTAINMENT CORP., -- Albany, said it would acquire Disc Jockey Music Stores from Wax Works Inc., Owensboro, Ky. Terms were not disclosed.
SPIEKER PROPERTIES INC., Menlo Park, Calif., will spend $142 million to build a 550,000-square-foot office tower in Bellevue, Wash.
